Continuing design work for phases past rough mechanicals: 
-Additional work on storefront window designs, if draft isn't acceptable. 
-Kitchen design and selections. 
-Additional prints modifications for changes (if any?)
-Any additional design work necessary to build out project past the phase of "rough mechanicals". Flooring selections. Trim design. Verbal bid at existing minus -5,000 for floor system not framed. 

Demo includes: 
1. Flat roof at skylights
2. Old Sky lights
3. Existing second floor rooms
4. Connect Flat roof

Framing includes: 
1. New flat roof at skylights and connecting side of building
2. Add all new overhangs.
3. Set new beams
4. Reframe skylight openings
5. 70 truss repairs
6. 5 rafter tail repairs by skylights
7. new roof decking with felt
8. Framer proves all fasteners.

All Interior framing

$29,000 for roof demo, and main framing
$5,000 for interior finish framing (REMOVED)
$2,000 for extra infill windows and install door ","quantity":1,"cost":"$31,000.00","tax":"","markup":"$0.20","net":"$37,200.00"},{"type":"leaf","cost_code":"300.300.103","name":"=> => Exterior finishing lumber ","description":"Finish plywood to infill door and window openings and trim.
